original_text: Yet these men were very good to us. They did not mistreat us, and the whole time we were out in the fields near them nothing was missing.
korean_text: 우리가 들에 있어 그들과 상종할 동안에 그 사람들이 우리를 매우 선대하였으므로 우리가 다치거나 잃은 것이 없었으니

sentences.original_text: Yet these men were very good to us.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이 사람들은 우리에게 매우 친절했습니다.

sentences.original_text: and the whole time we were out in the fields near them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리가 그들 근처 밖에 있는 동안 내내
